documentation.description: Returns the data stream options of the selected data streams.

name.description: A comma-separated list of data streams to get; use `*` to get all data streams

expand_wildcards.description: Whether wildcard expressions should get expanded to open or closed indices (default: open)

include_defaults.description: Return all relevant default configurations for the data stream (default: false)

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master
